text.front:
Dynamical evolution of a fermionic anharmonic oscillator
M. C. D. Barrozo, M. T. Thomaz, and A. F. R. de Toledo Piza
Citation: American Journal of Physics 63, 463 (1995); doi: 10.1119/1.17913
View online: http://dx.doi.org/10.1119/1.17913
View Table of Contents: http://scitation.aip.org/content/aapt/journal/ajp/63/5?ver=pdfcov
Published by the American Association of Physics Teachers
